description:
It is the last day of siege warfare before the culture festival, so Rusian and the others must take over and hold their fort until the end of gameplay so that they can take their screenshot. Will they be able to hold out long enough?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Net Game Wife Is a Girl Online!
Netoge no Yome wa Onnanoko Nandesu yo!
ネトゲの嫁は女の子なんですよ!
